title: Odd Freeze While on Training Battle
body:
When playing on the battle training (w/ all bots) a message popped up telling me to buy items from the shop. Upon pressing continue, nothing occurred. Then, the game froze; though I was able to scan over minions and view their stats, they had stopped moving entirely. I was forced to exit, which resulted in a ban. Obviously, being banned for being forced to quit a game with all bots was bad enough, but the game freezing really confused me. :|
Anyone have an idea what is going on?

replies.body: Yea that sounds pretty odd tbh. I'm looking at your account now, and I'm not seeing any current or past bans on this one. Was this in reference to a different account?
